sage.scene.shape

Class Sphere

  • java.lang.Object
    • sage.scene.SceneNode
      • sage.scene.Leaf
        • sage.scene.shape.Sphere

  • public class Sphere
extends Leaf
    Defines a Leaf which is a sphere. The default BoundingVolume for the Sphere is a BoundingSphere of the same radius as this Sphere.
    Author:
    John Clevenger

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class sage.scene.SceneNode

        SceneNode.CULL_MODE, SceneNode.RENDER_MODE

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class sage.scene.SceneNode

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Sphere()
      Constructs a sphere with a default name, a radius of 1.0, 4 stacks, 4 slices, and a default color of Color.white, and other attributes as defined by constructor Sphere(String, double, int, int, Color).

      Constructs a sphere with the specified parameters, which are passed to constructor Sphere(String,double,int,int,Color) along with a default name.

      Constructs a Sphere with the specified characteristics.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sphere

        public Sphere()
        Constructs a sphere with a default name, a radius of 1.0, 4 stacks, 4 slices, and a default color of Color.white, and other attributes as defined by constructor Sphere(String, double, int, int, Color).

      • Sphere

        public Sphere(double radius,
              int stacks,
              int slices,
              java.awt.Color color)
        Constructs a sphere with the specified parameters, which are passed to constructor Sphere(String,double,int,int,Color) along with a default name.

      • Sphere

        public Sphere(java.lang.String name,
              double radius,
              int stacks,
              int slices,
              java.awt.Color color)
        Constructs a Sphere with the specified characteristics. The Sphere is assigned a BoundingVolume which is a BoundingSphere with the same radius as this Sphere.
        Parameters:
        name - - the name of this SceneNode
        radius - - the radius of the sphere
        stacks - - the number of polygonal subdivisions of the sphere in the vertical direction
        slices - - the number of "slices" (polygonal subdivisions around the circumference as seen from the "top")
        color - - the color of the sphere

      • rotate

        public void rotate(int degrees)
        Applies a local rotation of the specified amount in degrees about the axis [1,1,1]. Note that this method always rotates about [1,1,1]; to rotate about a different axis see SceneNode.rotate(float, Vector3D).
        Parameters:
        degrees - The angle of rotation about [1,1,1]
        See Also:
        SceneNode.rotate(float, Vector3D)

      • draw

        public void draw(IRenderer r)
        Description copied from class: Leaf
        draw() draws the graphical representation of this Leaf. This method is specified by this class (and also by the parent SceneNode class) but must be implemented by any derived classes since the abstract Leaf class can't know how to draw the subclass object. Subclasses are expected to make a "callback" to the specified IRenderer object to draw the object in a graphics API-dependent way.
        Specified by:
        draw in class Leaf
        Parameters:
        r - - the IRenderer to be used to draw this Leaf.

      • updateLocalBound

        public void updateLocalBound()
        Description copied from class: Leaf
        updateLocalBound() computes a new local bounding volume for this Leaf by re-examining the vertex data for the leaf. This method is specified by this class (and also by the parent SceneNode class) but must be implemented by any derived classes since the abstract Leaf class can't know what the subclass data looks like (and hence can't know how to compute the bounding volume).
        Specified by:
        updateLocalBound in class Leaf
